pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw: I wasn't able to reproduce the issue using stairs, but I got a couple of crashes going back into the editor with the mouse moving fast out of the 2D view (as your backtrace suggested). This is hard to reproduce though... I hope commit dc6fddf helped a bit.
content.html: I wasn't able to reproduce the issue using stairs, but I got a couple of crashes going back into the editor with the mouse moving fast out of the 2D view (as your backtrace suggested). This is hard to reproduce though... I hope commit dc6fddf helped a bit.
